mapper.select: with clm_cst as( select clm.ord_no , coalesce(sum(clm.ord_amt * clm.ord_cnt),0) as clm_sum , coalesce(sum(cst.aply_dv_amt),0) as cst_sum from op_clm_info clm inner join op_ord_cost_info cst on clm.ord_no = cst.ord_no and clm.dv_grp_no = cst.dv_grp_no where clm.ord_clm_tp_cd = 'O' and (clm.ord_prgs_scd = '10' or clm.ord_prgs_scd = '20') and cst.aply_ccd = '10' group by clm.ord_no ),bnf as( select bnf.ord_no ,coalesce(sum(ord_bnf_amt),0) as bnf_sum from ( select distinct rel.ord_no, inf.ord_bnf_no, inf.ord_bnf_amt from op_ord_bnf_rel_info rel inner join op_ord_bnf_info inf on rel.ord_bnf_no = inf.ord_bnf_no where rel.aply_cncl_ccd = '10' ) as bnf group by ord_no ), pay as ( select ord_no , coalesce(sum(pay_amt),0) as pay_sum from op_pay_info where pay_ccd = '10' and ( pay_prgs_scd = '10' or pay_prgs_scd = '20') group by ord_no ) select pay_sum = clm_sum + cst_sum - coalesce(bnf_sum, 0) from pay inner join clm_cst on pay.ord_no = clm_cst.ord_no left join bnf on bnf.ord_no = clm_cst.ord_no where pay.ord_no = #{ordNo}
